{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3316490,"name":"Doruk Yıldırım","username":"Albiorin","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/albiorin/{size}/213194_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-24T04:04:14.598Z","cooked":"

Hi all. We are in the market for some battery chargers. I read that the MAXIMUM current FRC batteries should be charged at is 6 amps so I found this one which I looks like 4A but I am not sure. Is it suitable for FRC use? Thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2024-02-24T04:04:14.598Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1366,"reads":379,"readers_count":378,"score":6920.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":455952,"topic_slug":"battery-charger-recommendations","display_username":"Doruk Yıldırım","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.einhell.com.tr/en/p/1002225-ce-bc-4-m/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"CE-BC 4 M | Battery Charger","clicks":105}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55327,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"8780 Programming Lead / Driver"},"post_url":"/t/battery-charger-recommendations/455952/1","custom_user_title":"8780 Programming Lead / Driver","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3316501,"name":"Brendan R.","username":"Braykoff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/braykoff/{size}/204536_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-24T04:19:51.739Z","cooked":"

Our team uses these:

andymark.com

Battery Charger 3 Bank 6 Amp Dual Pro RS3 with SB50 Connectors

Battery Charger, 3 Bank, 6 AMPs

It looks like it has been replaced with these though:

andymark.com

NOCO Battery Charger

NOCO Genius Gen Series 5A 1 and 3 bank Battery ChargerThis charger is a must have tool for competition robotics teams and hobbyists using 12-volt lead-acid (flooded, gel, AGM) or lithium-ion batteries. NOCO chargers charge batteries to 100%...

Haven’t used the new ones so can’t attest them, however Andymark markets specifically to FRC teams and their quality is generally good. I would recommend these, its what most other teams are using.

Our team just started using the new ones. They are fantastic!! The batteries last longer on the robot, and you can check at a glance the power in the battery. Highly recommend!!

100 bought a set of powersonic batteries and powersonic chargers last year, and they’re working great! the ctek is terrific but the powersonic chargers produce the correct charging profile and they’re much less expensive.

PXL_20240221_030547209.MP1920×1440 320 KB

Battery in the Cloud

PSC-124000ACX

PSC-124000ACX is a direct replacement for the PSC-124000-PC charger. Product Summary The PSC-124000ACX is part of our A-C series of sealed lead acid (VRLA) switch-mode battery chargers. The A-C series chargers are switching type chargers which...

Price: USD 36.28

Yeah I just ordered the NOCO Genius 2X2. I would have gone for the 5X3 at andymark however shipping and import processes take a hell of a long time here in Turkey so I ordered one from amazon here. I will update this post to inform you all on how it performs.

We’ve got one of the old Dual Pro RS3 chargers, but we also have a fleet of these Powerstream ones off Spectrum’s recommendation a few years ago. Can confirm, once you swap in the SB-50 cable they’re stout units.

powerstream.com

5.5 Amp 12 Volt battery chargers for lead acid, SLA, VRLA, Gel, and AGM...

Intelligent multistage 12V battery chargers for lead acid batteries for trolling motors, bicycles and scooters use switchmode power, making them lighter and smaller, and more powerful for portability
